
## Class : submucosa of colon

 * *IRI* = http://purl.obolibrary.org/obo/UBERON_0003331
 * *Label* = submucosa of colon
 * *Definition* = A submucosa that is part of a colon [Automatically generated definition]. [ [database_cross_reference](../../ef/oboInOwl#hasDbXref.md) = OBOL:automatic ]
